description: Second revision. More hops, more malt, more everything. Everything Lupula is and more.
Resinous, douglas fir with citrus and lychee.
Rich maltiness with caramel and toast. Spice with floral aroma.
Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.
Biscuity, toasty, caramel, coffee, and vanilla. Conditioned on Peruvian coffee beans.
Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on fresh plums.
Enhanced with thiol-enriched Motueka from Freestyle Hops x Phantasm. Peach, pineapple and white grape.
